channel.title: How long does it take to unstake XRD from a Validator?
channel.description:
It currently takes about 12 to 14 days to unstake.
### Further explaination: It takes exactly **500** epochs to unstake your XRD from a validator. Each epoch consists of 10,000 rounds. The precise length of an epoch is based on the rate that the network produces rounds rather than on a fixed "wall clock" time.
Currently, epochs take about 35 minutes each on average.
## Further reading: https://learn.radixdlt.com/article/how-long-is-an-epoch-on-radix
